user_query: I'm organizing a family reunion and I want to create personalized avatars for each family member. Generate initials avatars for all family members with their names and display them on a family tree. Additionally, provide me with some fun icebreaker games to play during the reunion.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of family members' names and initials for avatar creation.
Create personalized avatars for each family member using their initials and names.
required_inputs: list of names and initials from step 1

TaskList.description: Display the generated avatars on a family tree structure.
Research and compile a list of fun icebreaker games suitable for family reunions.
Prepare a presentation or document to showcase the family tree and icebreaker games.
